title: Napa River Insurance Services Expands Management Team
text:
Peter Mazurek Named Director
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Napa River Insurance Services, Inc. (Napa River), the third‐party administrator (TPA) wholly‐owned by Hudson Insurance Group (Hudson), today announced the appointment of Peter Mazurek as Director of Marketing & TPA Operations. In this new position, Mr. Mazurek is responsible for overseeing claim and risk management services across Napa River’s transportation, healthcare and public entity business segments.
“We are delighted to have Peter at the helm of our operations,” said Peggy Killeen, Senior Vice President and Chief Claims Officer of Hudson. “His significant expertise in operations and systems will enable us to reach new heights in terms of providing innovative products and services to meet our clients’ unique needs.”
Mr. Mazurek brings more than 20 years of experience to Napa River. He most recently served as Vice President of Operations & Business Development at Innova Claims Management LLC, which he joined after the successful sale of Specialty Claims Management, LLC.
In addition to Mr. Mazurek, Carlos Lopez joined Napa River as Claim Manager for Transportation.
Mr. Lopez has 15 years of insurance claims handling and leadership experience across multiple lines of business. Prior to joining Napa River, he was Claims Supervisor at Protective Insurance. He holds the Chartered Property and Casualty Underwriter and Senior Claims Law Associate designations. Both Mr. Mazurek and Mr. Lopez are based in Napa River’s Indianapolis office.
Napa River has experienced 58% growth in its transportation business alone during the past two calendar years. Mr. Mazurek added, “I’m excited by what Napa River has accomplished in a short time frame and look forward to growing this business and expanding our team.”
About Napa River Insurance Services
Napa River Insurance Services, Inc. is a California domiciled third-party administrator that provides superior claims and risk management services to clients in niche markets. Its employees are located in Napa, CA; Chicago; Indianapolis; New York and Avon, CT. Napa River is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Hudson Insurance Company. For more information, visit www.napariverinsurance.com .
